basics.name: Gnana Chaithanya Gali
basics.title: Data analyst
basics.summary: Passionate software engineer with 2 years of IT experience in Life sciences projects and worked in Node.js, Express js (middleware), Python, SQL, Aws cloud services as a Backend developer and Data engineer

projects.title: E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Built a scalable e-commerce platform handling 100K+ monthly transactions. The platform includes features like real-time inventory management, advanced search capabilities, and a sophisticated recommendation engine.
responsibilities: Led the architectural design and implementation of the platform
Managed a team of 8 developers across frontend and backend
Implemented microservices architecture for better scalability
Optimized database queries resulting in 40% faster page loads
Established CI/CD pipelines and coding standards

projects.title: Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Developed a real-time analytics dashboard for financial data visualization. The system processes millions of data points and presents them in an intuitive interface with interactive charts and customizable widgets.
responsibilities: Architected the frontend infrastructure using React and TypeScript
Implemented complex data visualizations using D3.js
Designed and implemented real-time data synchronization
Optimized performance for handling large datasets
Mentored junior developers on the team
